# Draft:Rulish Empire

----
The Second Rulish Empire, also known as simply the Rulish Empire, is a micronation in the city of Perth, Western Australia. The state was founded by Ruben on 22 July 2023, after the Declaration of Independence from the Perth Empire, another micronation in the area who ultimately disappeared in July of the same year. The Second Rulish Empire is currently the strongest micronation in Perth, being at 5.0 on the micronational Military Power index, a military superpower.
Etymology
The name "Ruland" is a portmanteau, of the founding leaders name "Ruben" and the word "Land" which means, "Land of Ruben". This name was adopted by his majesty during the dictator era of 2023, and is still used today to show our history as a micronation.
History
The Rulish Empire has a strong and significant history. Ruland has been the creator and the destruction of many micronations, mostly in Perth.
The Creation
The Rulish Empire was founded by Emperor Ruben Bushell I on the evening of the 22nd July 2023. This day marked the end of the Perth empire and the start of a new nation that is influential to this day. On this day, the first draft of the Constitution was published for all citizens to read. Unfortunately, this copy of the constitution is no longer avaliable for public access.
The Swanicc Wars
Ruland and the Grand Duchy of Swan had been enemies from the very start. Minor border conflicts were often, and peace was never properly achieved,a the . The Rulish Empire declared war on the Grand Duchy of Swan many times, however these wars were usually uneventful and usually resulted in white peace.
Westrali-Goofiest War
Rulish Victory
The Westrali-Goofiest War was a major conflict between the Rulish Empire (and Grand Duchy of Swan) against the Goofiest Republic. There were many losses on both sides during this conflict. Major physical warfare was a part of this war, and it was stuck in a stalemate for the days it dragged on. Eventually, as the resources for the Goofiest Republic depleted, the Rulish Empire gained victory. The deal was as follows: The Goofiest Republic shall be split between the Grand Duchy of Swan and the Rulish Empire, and Tristan Wilce shall be banished from all nations.
Perth-Swanicc War
Swanicc Victory
The Perth-Swanic War was a major conflict between the Perth Alliance (Rulish Empire and Vinland) and the Grand Duchy of Swan. This was the first proper war between the two powers. The Rulish attack started off strong, but resources diminished quickly, leaving the Rulish Empire in a bad position. This meant, if Ruland were to win this war, we would have to fight on a defensive front. General Seb Smith took charge of the Rulish side. Using the minimal resources that were available,, the Rulish Empire managed to push back the Swanicc forces. After many long days of fighting, Seb Smith signed for peace. The deal was as follows: Emperor Ruben Bushell shall be stripped of his power, Seb Smith shall gain all power over Ruland, the Rulish Military shall be disbanded and the Rulish Empire shall owe ~~ dollars to the Grand Duchy of Swan. Luckily, however, Seb Smith gave Ruben Bushell back power over the nation and secretly began work for revenge against the Grand Duchy of Swan.
4th Rulish Swanicc War
Rulish Victory
The 4th Rulish-Swanicc War was a major conflict between the Rulish Empire and the Grand Duchy of Swan. This conflict marked the start of the "modern" rulish empire as it is today. Physical warfare, mostly using plastic guns, was commonly used in this war. The Grand Duchy of Swan was caught off guard by this sudden conflict, but managed to hold its ground as the Rulish Empire pushed into its territory. The Grand Duchy of Swan responded to this offensive with their counterattack, with a direct attack against the Rulish Capital, at the battle of East Ruland. Luckily for the Rulish Empire, this battle did not go well for them. The Rulish soldiers were dug into trenches and other defensive positions, which made it hard for the Swaniccs to advance any further. The Rulish soldiers pushed the Swanicc soldiers outside of the Capital, into a more dense, forested area where the battle continued in trench warfare. After hours of waiting and planning, the Rulish soldiers surprised the Swaniccs with an attack on their trench, which went very well. The Swanicc soldiers were pushed back into their capital. From this point on, only minor battles along the border would occur and both sides would push for peace on their terms, until May 2nd, 2024 when the Grand Duchy of Swan signed Rulish terms for Peace, where the Grand Duchy of Swan would be no more than a SAR in the Rulish Empire. Eventually, this SAR would fully integrate into the Rulish Empire, developing into what we now know as the State of Swan.
War of the Indian Ocean and the Wheatbelt
Rulish Victory
The USRR (Now DPRR) was originally a rebel group in the Rulish Empire, formed after a failed communist uprising in the Rulish Empire. This rebel group was originally not seen as a threat by the Rulish Empire, which was a very bad decision. The USRR picked up steam among citizens in the state of Swan and Cannington, rapidly developing relations with other nations and creating a military. Eventually, the Rulish Military started to take action. The Rulish soldiers started minor battles along, the border to slow the rebellion down, but it was too late. Other nations, such as Ploktenstein and Bayola began to support the USRR and began to provide military aid to the USRR. Soon after, attacks on the Mandurah colonies began, which started the Mandurah front. This front was a key part of the war, as it provide a lot of economic support for both sides. Rulish Soldiers first took it in the First Battle of Mandurah, the captured by the USRR in the Second, then recaptured in the Third. Eventually, in the most historic campaign Ruland has had, both sides went very far down south in the Augusta Campaign. There were many minor battles along the South-West tip of Western Australia. Still, in Augusta, at the battle of Molloy, which lastest 6 days, the third army division of Ruland created an offensive front against the USRR. The USRR were overwhelmed by the Rulish force, resulting in the re-capture of HMRS Molloy and the defeat of the USRR in Augusta. In short, the Augusta campaign was a massive success for the Rulish Empire, as it created stable economic points of intreset and military ouposts, all over South-West Australia. Back up north, on the Perth front, the 1st division had created an offensive in the Swanicc area, re-capturing most of the lost territory. Eventually, after many back and forths, the USRR signed the terms on the Rulish side which allowed the USRR to gain independence from the Rulish Empire under strict borders. Unluckily, this war was far from over. While Ploktenstein left the war alongside the USRR, Bayola still stood their ground. The Third Infantry Division went along on a campaign to the Wheatbelt, capturing many key points including the Bayolan capital in Northam. On November 3rd, 2024, Bayola signed for peace with the Rulish Empire, giving all of their land claims over to the Rulish Empire. The war was a success for the Rulish Empire, as it gave us many key areas, that we still use to this day to increase our GDP and security.
Peaceful Era
The Peaceful Era (3rd November 2024 - 13th May 2025) has been one of the only time in Rulish history where we have had complete peace. Ruland has mostly focused on developing economically and politically. We have focused on our Internal Affairs and our forigen relations mostly this era.
War of East Perth
Rulish Empire Likely
The War of East Perth, between the Republics of Bayswater and the Second Rulish Empire, from the 13th of May, 2025 - current, has been the Rulish Empire's first physical war since November of 2024. The Democratic People's Republic of Ruland is heavily involved in this war. From the Rulish Empire's request, the DPRR has supported both sides of the war, fighting for Bayswater but continuing good relations with the Rulish Empire. Currently, the Rulish Empire has lauched small strike groups to take small areas on Bayswater's western borders.
Politics and government
Current Government
The current government is democratically elected in each electorate. Similar to how Australian voting works, the Rulish electoral system works by having citizens of each electorate vote on a representative who they thing would most suit their needs. Whichever representative wins for that electorate will earn a seat in parliament for their party. If one party reaches a majority, or hold more seats than any other party, they will form government and their party leader, if they win their own electorates seat, will become the new Elected Prime Minister of Ruland. We do this to ensure a fair and democratic Rulish society, where no one person can rig elections and be in power. However, there is no term limit, so the EPM, if elected each time, may run for however many times they want. Terms in the Rulish Empire are 3 months long.

Head of state
The head of state is the Emperor. The Emperor no longer has much power, however he is the only one to have the poower to sign off on laws which have passed through as democratic election in parliament or fire judges. If a judge fails to fufil their duty in the justice system, the head of state is allowed to personally fire them from the Rulish Department of Justice.
Head of government
The Head of Government is known in Ruland as the "Elected Prime Minister" the Elected Prime Minister is democraticly elected by all eligable votes across the nation. The EPM is the leader of whichever party gains the majority of seats in parliament. The EPM acts as the representative of the nation. They lead their people, making decisions on their behalf, however they do not have all power, and must pass their laws through a democratic election in Parliament.
Seb Smith
The first elected prime minister of the Empire.
Liam Hare
The Second elected prime minister of the Empire. Elected in early 2024.
Harry Stowe
Harry Stowe is the third elected prime minister. Harry Stowe was elected halfway through 2024.
Adam Lowe
Adam Lowe was the fourth elected prime minister. He was elected around three months after harry stowe.
Ruben Bushell
Ruben Bushell is the current elected prime minister and emperor of the Rulish Empire. He has currently served almost 2 terms.
Departments
The departments role is to manage a specific sector of government. Most departments are led by a minister and is managed by that minister, although some departments are either led by the head of state or they don't have a minister.
ROEAC
The Rulish Office of Election and Corruption, or simply the Department of Corruption claims focuses on finding out about political of military corruption in high ranking officials, and putting them to justice through the court system. The Department of Corruption was founded by the Second EPM, Liam Hare, and is continued to be run by the current EPM, Ruben Bushell.
Department of External Affairs
The Department of External Affairs focuses on provide information to outside micronations or forigeners. It represents the nation when dealing with affairs outside of the nation, such as peacekeeping, or alliances. The Department of External Affairs helps other micronations to gain bilateral regonition with the Rulish Empire, and it aims to keep the Rulish Empire's forigen policy in place.
Department of Immigration
The Department of Immigration focuses on the safe keeping of Rulish travelers, and forigners. It aims to provide information on travel, when to travel and how safe it is to travel to said destination. It also provides information on how to become a citizen of the Rulish Empire, hwo to get a passport and Visa information.
Department of Internal Affairs
This department is the main internal authority of the empire it controls banking, internal security and news. While there are departments for these, such as the Department of Finance, it is all run by the Department of Internal Affairs. The Department of Internal Affairs helps create a stable growth in population, economics, etc.
Department of Defence
Ruland has three branches of our military, the royal army, the royal navy and the royal air force.
Military Capabilities
The Rulish Empire's military has around 45 personnel, trained at the highest standards of almost all micronations globally. We take pride in our work, constantly defending our borders and taking the quickest action against external and internal threats than any other micronation. Being a large micronation, all our borders must be secure at all times, which is why we have multiple divisions stationed at outposts along the entire border. Our armoury consists of almost a hundred weapons, all suited for any type of terrain, whether sandy, wet or humid, we have weapons for it. We have many gadgets designed to "dig in" to defensive trench positions, no matter what surface we find ourselves on. We have many vehicles across all areas of the military, cars, boats and even small aircraft. Each vehicle can be equipped with light machine guns, equipped with 20 3-inch plastic bullets ready for any attacks. Ruland has an incredibly high military spending, at almost 10% of our GDP being spent on military and intelligence.Ruland has been proven to beat other competitors in Perth based on strength, which is why Ruland has gained the number 1 title as most strongest military in Perth.
Foreign relations
The foreign policy of Ruland is to hold our values of freedom and justice and to build good relations with other micronations as well as our allies.

Administrative region
The Rulish Empire controls almost 30 colonies worldwide. Most colonies are found close to the mainland, in Australia. About a third of our colonies is found overseas in Oceania, South-east Asia, Europe, America and the Middle East. The mainland consists of 5 states controlled by their own state government, similar to how the states are run in the United States.
Geography and climate
Mainland Ruland is a mostly flat, suburban area with minimal forested regions. The temperature here usually doesn't exceed 40 degrees Celsius, or go below 10 degrees. The weather is usually plain, sunny and hot during the Summer months and is often overcast and more moderate in the Winter months. Down south in the Augusta colonies, the temperature is much colder, going down to about 4 degrees and up to 20 degrees. The colonies are all in very dense, forested areas surrounded by many Australian native plants. In this area, it is usually overcast with some sun in the Winter months. Getting closer to the desert, the Wheatbelt colonies are in golden wheat fields. The temperature here soars in the Summer months, going up to 45 degrees; however, in the nighttime and early morning, the temperature can get as low as the Augusta colonies. In these colonies, it is usually sunny, with some rain in the winter seasons. Colonies all over the world, being at different locations all experience different weather, from snow to extreme temperatures up to 50 degrees. Ruland is a truly geographically diverse nation.
Severe weather
Ruland sometimes experiences extreme weather, including heat waves (40 degrees and up) or stormy weather.
Culture
Over the years that Ruland has existed, it has created a robust culture.
Food
Rulish food is created in our kitchens. The national dish of Ruland, seasoned chicken curry with white rice, is created all over Ruland. Desserts are also a big part of Ruland. Pavlova is our nation's national dish. Usually served with fresh strawberries and whipped cream, pavlova is loved in every corner of our nation. For lunch, based on the 2025 census, our people usually prefer a light sandwich with a singular type of meat, from beef to ham and some vegetables, such as lettuce.
Religion
The Rulish Empire has a moderately diverse number of religious people. Ruland, despite being an Anglican nation, has only 12.5% of people identifying as Anglican. Another 12.5% say they believe in Sikhism and the remainder are Athiest or Agnostic.
Language
The Rulish Empire has 2 national languages, reflecting most of our nation's ethnicity. These two languages are English, with 100% of the population speaking it and German, with 12.5% of the population speaking it.
Sport
The majority of the Rulish people are athletic and love sports. The Rulish Empire has created a newer version of handball, with new rules and the use of a volleyball instead of a normal handball.
